mapper.insert: insert into sys_code( para_code, para_value, para_type, is_valid, notes )values( #{paraCode}, #{paraValue}, #{paraType.id}, #{isValid}, #{notes} )
mapper.select: select ks.id as id, ks.para_code as paraCode, ks.para_value as paraValue, ks.para_type as paraType, ks.is_valid as isValid, ks.notes as notes, ksty.id as TypeId, ksty.para_type as typeParaType, ksty.notes as typeNotes from sys_code ks,sys_param_type ksty where ks.para_type=ksty.id limit #{start},#{length}
select count(*) from sys_code ks,sys_param_type ksty where ks.para_type=ksty.id

select ks.id as id, ks.para_code as paraCode, ks.para_value as paraValue, ks.para_type as paraType, ks.is_valid as isValid, ks.notes as notes, ksty.id as TypeId, ksty.para_type as typeParaType, ksty.notes as typeNotes from sys_code ks,sys_param_type ksty where ks.para_type=ksty.id and ks.id=#{id}
